content: {"name": "Dream Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "If anyone needs food outside of our distribution time, they may send an email to outreach@thedreamcenterchurch.org and we will be happy to serve them.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.dreamcenteratl.org/contact", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2600 H F Shepherd Drive", "address_2": null, "city": "Decatur", "state_province": "GA", "postal_code": "30034", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 33.7110823, "longitude": -84.2832255}, "phones": [{"number": "(770) 396-9884", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": ""}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": ""}, {"weekday": "Sunday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": ""}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}]}
